job_history.work_description: Manage all aspects of accounting operations, overseeing day to day transactions related to general ledger, accounts payable, accounts receivable, fixed assets, cash accounts, payroll and purchasing. Reviews financial statements. Reviews results of operations and ensures proper reporting to program head to understand revenue and cost drivers and define appropriate reports for monitoring improvement.

Prepares financial statement of regional headquarters. Consolidates financial statement of companies and reports to the higher management. Reviews financial statement and schedules of operating company. Provides variance analysis against approved budget.

Prepare invoices and follow-up on payments. Prepare payments to vendors. Prepare tax returns and other regulatory reports Process payroll. Handles bank transactions. Handles bookkeeping and preparation of financial statements and schedules.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Over 15 years of experience in accounting, including managing all aspects of accounting operations, preparing financial statements, and handling bookkeeping, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Statement Preparation
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in preparing financial statements, consolidating financial statements of companies, and reviewing financial statements, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll processing consistently across multiple roles, suggesting a strong proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Provided variance analysis against approved budget and ensured proper reporting to program head, indicating a strong proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Reviewed financial statements, results of operations, and provided variance analysis, suggesting a strong proficiency in financial analysis.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed all aspects of accounting operations and reviewed financial statements, indicating a strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Bookkeeping
skills.explanation: Handled bookkeeping and preparation of financial statements and schedules, suggesting a strong proficiency in bookkeeping.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Ensured proper reporting to program head and prepared financial statements, indicating a strong proficiency in financial reporting.
